descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Oathbreakers is a multiplayer open-world fantasy VR RPG that incorporates a unique blend of strategic precision-based real-time action combat with unrestricted player vs player competitiveness in a relaxing survival MMORPG themed environment.

Favouring a player-performance based approach to gameplay, Oathbreakers challenges you to discover, gather, earn, learn, craft, customise and master an arsenal of spells, stats, weapons and equipment to define your own play style and achieve your goals.

‎ 

🗡️ **Master Combat**
- Battle fierce monsters in dynamic dungeons.
- Engage in intense open-world PvP.
- Excel in melee, magic, and archery combat.
- Explore a collection of weapons to customize your combat style.

‎ 

🔨 **Craft Your Destiny**
- Gather and refine resources to upgrade your gear.
- Create powerful weapons and craft game-changing spells.
- Develop MMORPG skills like fishing, cooking, foraging, mining, alchemy, pickpocketing and more.

‎ 

🏛️ **Build Your Legend**
- Customize your character with unique stats and skills.
- Unlock achievements and climb the ranks.
- Navigate a MMO world with dungeons and a destiny defining karma system.

‎ 

🌐 **Socialize and Explore**
- Embark on quests and missions.
- Join guilds for exclusive perks.
- Enjoy entertainment facilities and currency trading.
- Explore public and private worlds, hunt for treasures, and more. 

‎ 

Unleash your creativity, master your skills, and become the hero or villain you were meant to be!
